views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 and till 12.1.2.

actualFBPullToRefreshView is a Tiny Tweak that Makes Blue the Facebook Pull to Refresh Spinner View to Better Fit the New Facebook Top Left Header Logo!

The Tweak is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository also Bringing arm64e/A12 Devices Support.

No options to Configure.

See Screenshots below about How It Was Before and After.

Thanks @_024ka for testing.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!
